thread.title: For Designers: ‘Pen Tool’ Cheat Sheet For Adobe Illustrator
thread.title_full: For Designers: ‘Pen Tool’ Cheat Sheet For Adobe Illustrator

title: For Designers: ‘Pen Tool’ Cheat Sheet For Adobe Illustrator
text: For Designers: ‘Pen Tool’ Cheat Sheet For Adobe Illustrator By Yoon Sann Wong , 02 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook Paul Trani , senior worldwide Creative Cloud evangelist for Adobe , is behind this ‘Pen Tool’ cheat sheet for Adobe Illustrator . Designers will likely find the guide helpful in quickly crafting straight and curved lines, adding and deleting points, moving and removing Bezier handles, as well as transforming a straight line into a curved line.
